name: Power BI Desktop Template
summary: A PBIT file is a template created by Power BI Desktop, a Microsoft application used to create reports and visualizations. It contains queries, visualization settings, data models, reports, and other data added by the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PBIT file open in Microsoft Power BI Desktop 2
images.alt: PBIT file open in Microsoft Power BI Desktop 2
